title: Transgender in Colorado: Fort Carson soldier lives "A genuine life"
text:
Published By: Denver Post Local - Today 
Army Staff Sgt. Patricia King is among an estimated 15,500 transgender troops who are banned by military policy and yet continue to serve th...
